td.content: s:a white female economist aged 48 ys says she is having symptoms of moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear 15-16 times a week, mostly during the day. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 52.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:patient presents with 7 weeks history of worsening moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. she is a 48 yr old white F economist. Patient is a moderate drinker she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 166 cm, Weight 52.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Myringotomy - ear.

s:a female economist aged 49 ys presents with 18 months history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. patient reports moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. Patient does not smoke she drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 167 cm, Weight 54 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:patient C/O moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate pain and discharge in ear. NKDA. she is a white female economist aged 49 yrs. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 54.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gabapentin - 1800 mg daily.
